verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Open up the skies and rain The heavens down, the heavens down Father open up the skies and rain The heavens down on us.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Open up our eyes to see Your glory found, all around Jesus, open up our eyes to see Your glory all around{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We are longing, hope is dawning Heaven’s falling, come Lord Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Open up our hearts to say, “Have Your way, have Your way” Spirit, open up our hearts to say, “Won’t You come and have Your way.”{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
